body.text:
A device sends an ARP packet to the HUB

(Click on ARP packet)
The HUB will broadcast an ARP message asking any device, that is connected on a local network, whether it knows the specified IP address

A device that has the requested IP replies with ARP reply packet.

Click the packet to see its structure
HUB sends this "ARP reply" packet back to the original device

childItems.name: Target Hardware Address
childItems.description: The hardware address of the device which is receiving the message. For broadcast message "FF : FF : FF : FF : FF : FF" address is used

childItems.name: Hardware Type
childItems.description: This field specifies the network link protocol type. Example: Ethernet is 1

childItems.name: Hardware Type
childItems.description: This field specifies the network link protocol type. Example: Ethernet is 1
